Summary: Blueish light flying in eratic circles, and moving from left to right before slowly disappearing into a low level cloud.
trends: There has been one other sighting in St John
There were no other sightings in St John on or around August 28th 2009
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI was attendind a high school football game in St. John Indiana(Lake Central High School), when at half time ( 8:20pm) I went to my car in the parking lot. As I approched my car I looked up to see a light in the sky, at first I thought it may be a star. As i watched the light I ruled out that it was a star because the light was below the cloud cover. (The clouds were low approx. 3000 to 5000 feet.) As I watched the light it started to move, slowly at first left to right, right to left. Soon the light was making circles not perfect circles but eratic ones. I continues to watch the light for Approx. 1 minute 30 seconds then the light slowly accended into the clouds and I lost sight of it.
